mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER()OVER(ORDER BY SEQ DESC) AS RNUM, SEQ, BOARD_CODE, EMAIL, TITLE, CONTENT, FILENAME, LOCATION, LOCATION_DETAIL, CATEGORY, PRICE, PEOPLE, PERSONCOUNT, READCOUNT, LIKECOUNT, REPORTCOUNT, PDATE, EDATE, REGDATE, DEL FROM PM_PLAYBOARD WHERE 1=1 AND CATEGORY LIKE '%'||#{playCategory}||'%'
)
AND DEL=1
AND EDATE <= SYSDATE
AND EMAIL LIKE '%'||#{searchText}||'%'
AND TITLE LIKE '%'||#{searchText}||'%'
AND CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{searchText}||'%'
AND LOCATION LIKE '%'||#{searchText}||'%'
)

SELECT SEQ, BOARD_CODE, EMAIL, NICKNAME, TITLE, CONTENT, FILENAME, LOCATION, LOCATION_DETAIL, CATEGORY, PRICE, PEOPLE, PERSONCOUNT, READCOUNT, LIKECOUNT, REPORTCOUNT, PDATE, EDATE, REGDATE, DEL FROM PM_PLAYBOARD, (SELECT NICKNAME FROM PM_MEMBER WHERE EMAIL=(SELECT EMAIL FROM PM_PLAYBOARD WHERE SEQ=#{seq})) WHERE SEQ=#{seq}

SELECT R.SEQ, R.BOARD_CODE, R.BOARD_SEQ, R.EMAIL, M.NICKNAME, R.REASON FROM PM_BOARD_REPORT R JOIN PM_MEMBER M ON R.EMAIL = M.EMAIL WHERE R.BOARD_CODE=#{board_code} AND R.BOARD_SEQ=#{board_seq} ORDER BY R.SEQ ASC
mapper.update:
UPDATE
PM_PLAYBOARD
PM_FREEBOARD
SET REPORTCOUNT = REPORTCOUNT-1 WHERE SEQ=#{board_seq}
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT EMAIL, PWD, NAME, NICKNAME, POSTCODE, ADDRESS, ADDRESS_DETAIL, ADDRESS_REFER, PHONE, TOTALPOINT, POINT, S_POINT, REPORTCOUNT, AUTH, GRADE_NAME, MYPROFILE_IMG, MYAGE, MYSEX, MYINTRO, PETPROFILE_IMG, PETNAME, PETAGE, PETTYPE, PETDETAIL, PETWEIGHT, PETSEX, PETTNR, PETINTRO, ROW_NUMBER()OVER(ORDER BY EMAIL ASC) AS RNUM FROM ( SELECT M.EMAIL, M.PWD, M.NAME, M.NICKNAME, M.POSTCODE, M.ADDRESS, M.ADDRESS_DETAIL, M.ADDRESS_REFER, M.PHONE, M.TOTALPOINT, M.POINT, M.S_POINT, M.REPORTCOUNT, M.AUTH, (SELECT GRADE_NAME FROM PM_GRADE WHERE M.TOTALPOINT >= MIN_POINT AND TOTALPOINT <= MAX_POINT) AS GRADE_NAME, P.MYPROFILE_IMG, P.MYAGE, P.MYSEX, P.MYINTRO, F.PETPROFILE_IMG, F.PETNAME, F.PETAGE, F.PETTYPE, F.PETDETAIL, F.PETWEIGHT, F.PETSEX, F.PETTNR, F.PETINTRO FROM PM_MEMBER M FULL OUTER JOIN PM_MYPROFILE P ON M.EMAIL=P.EMAIL FULL OUTER JOIN PM_PETPROFILE F ON M.EMAIL=F.EMAIL WHERE 1=1
AND
M.EMAIL LIKE '%'||#{search_txt}||'%'
M.NICKNAME LIKE '%'||#{search_txt}||'%'
AND M.REPORTCOUNT > 0
AND M.REPORTCOUNT AND
M.EMAIL LIKE '%'||#{search_txt}||'%'
M.NICKNAME LIKE '%'||#{search_txt}||'%'
) A WHERE GRADE_NAME=#{grade} GRADE_NAME LIKE '%'||#{grade}||'%' ) WHERE RNUM >= #{start} AND RNUM <= #{end}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT EMAIL, PWD, NAME, NICKNAME, POSTCODE, ADDRESS, ADDRESS_DETAIL, ADDRESS_REFER, PHONE, TOTALPOINT, POINT, S_POINT, REPORTCOUNT, AUTH, GRADE_NAME, MYPROFILE_IMG, MYAGE, MYSEX, MYINTRO, PETPROFILE_IMG, PETNAME, PETAGE, PETTYPE, PETDETAIL, PETWEIGHT, PETSEX, PETTNR, PETINTRO, ROW_NUMBER()OVER(ORDER BY EMAIL ASC) AS RNUM FROM ( SELECT M.EMAIL, M.PWD, M.NAME, M.NICKNAME, M.POSTCODE, M.ADDRESS, M.ADDRESS_DETAIL, M.ADDRESS_REFER, M.PHONE, M.TOTALPOINT, M.POINT, M.S_POINT, M.REPORTCOUNT, M.AUTH, (SELECT GRADE_NAME FROM PM_GRADE WHERE M.TOTALPOINT >= MIN_POINT AND TOTALPOINT <= MAX_POINT) AS GRADE_NAME, P.MYPROFILE_IMG, P.MYAGE, P.MYSEX, P.MYINTRO, F.PETPROFILE_IMG, F.PETNAME, F.PETAGE, F.PETTYPE, F.PETDETAIL, F.PETWEIGHT, F.PETSEX, F.PETTNR, F.PETINTRO FROM PM_MEMBER M FULL OUTER JOIN PM_MYPROFILE P ON M.EMAIL=P.EMAIL FULL OUTER JOIN PM_PETPROFILE F ON M.EMAIL=F.EMAIL WHERE 1=1
AND
M.EMAIL LIKE '%'||#{search_txt}||'%'
M.NICKNAME LIKE '%'||#{search_txt}||'%'
AND M.REPORTCOUNT > 0
AND M.REPORTCOUNT AND
M.EMAIL LIKE '%'||#{search_txt}||'%'
M.NICKNAME LIKE '%'||#{search_txt}||'%'
) A WHERE GRADE_NAME=#{grade} GRADE_NAME LIKE '%'||#{grade}||'%' )

SELECT M.EMAIL, M.PWD, M.NAME, M.NICKNAME, M.POSTCODE, M.ADDRESS, M.ADDRESS_DETAIL, M.ADDRESS_REFER, M.PHONE, M.TOTALPOINT, M.POINT, M.S_POINT, M.REPORTCOUNT, M.AUTH, (SELECT GRADE_NAME FROM PM_GRADE WHERE M.TOTALPOINT >= MIN_POINT AND TOTALPOINT <= MAX_POINT) AS GRADE_NAME, P.MYPROFILE_IMG, P.MYAGE, P.MYSEX, P.MYINTRO, F.PETPROFILE_IMG, F.PETNAME, F.PETAGE, F.PETTYPE, F.PETDETAIL, F.PETWEIGHT, F.PETSEX, F.PETTNR, F.PETINTRO FROM PM_MEMBER M FULL OUTER JOIN PM_MYPROFILE P ON M.EMAIL=P.EMAIL FULL OUTER JOIN PM_PETPROFILE F ON M.EMAIL=F.EMAIL WHERE M.EMAIL=#{email}
SELECT R.SEQ, R.BAD_EMAIL, R.EMAIL, M.NICKNAME, R.REASON FROM PM_MEMBER_REPORT R JOIN PM_MEMBER M ON R.EMAIL = M.EMAIL WHERE R.BAD_EMAIL=#{email} ORDER BY R.SEQ ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PM_FUNDINGBOARD(SEQ, BOARD_CODE, EMAIL, TITLE, INTRO, CONTENT, THUMBNAIL, MAX_PRICE, CURRENT_PRICE, PERSONCOUNT, LIKECOUNT, READCOUNT,SDATE, EDATE, REGDATE) VALUES(PM_FUNDINGBOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, 'FUND', #{email}, #{title}, #{intro}, #{content}, #{thumbnail}, #{max_price}, 0, 0, 0, 0, #{sdate}, #{edate}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select:
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) AS CNT FROM PM_FUNDINGBOARD
WHERE 1=1
AND EDATE >= SYSDATE AND CURRENT_PRICE < MAX_PRICE
AND EDATE < SYSDATE OR CURRENT_PRICE = MAX_PRICE
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PM_FUNDING_STA WHERE SEQ=#{seq}
